meanings.definition: The state or quality of being bony.
meanings.sent1: Her cat's boninesses were noticeable when it stretched out in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's boninesses to assess their overall health.
meanings.sent3: The boninesses of the Halloween skeleton decoration made it look extra spooky.
meanings.sent4: The old house creaked with the boninesses of its wooden frame.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the boninesses of the tree branches in the painting with great detail.

meanings.definition: The presence of bones or bone-like structures.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed the boninesses of ancient dinosaur fossils.
meanings.sent2: The x-ray revealed the boninesses of the broken arm.
meanings.sent3: The dog's toy was shaped like a bone, emphasizing its boninesses.
meanings.sent4: The graveyard was filled with the boninesses of those who came before.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist carefully unearthed the boninesses of a long-lost civilization.
